name: Spooky Sheep
description:
Your sheep disappear on the night before Halloween. You follow the trails to the forbidden woods and discover the unthinkable truth.

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - jump
  • Shift - toggle run/walk
  • E/Enter - next slide (in intro)
Credits

Leonid Dudakov (@DetectiveLosos) - VFX, Programming, Game Design

Natalia Sedova (natalyasedova17) - 3D assets, Game Design, Music

Annie Owl (@owl_annie) - Level Design, Game Design

Free Assets Used
  • Outdoor Ground Textures
  • Free textures from textures.com
